recipe.name: "Quick Whoopie Pies"
recipe.ingredients: "12 soft chocolate cookies,3.5 ounce marshmallow creme,1/4 cup butter,4 ounce reduced-fat cream cheese"

recipe.name: "Chewy Chocolate Caramel Bars"
recipe.ingredients: "1 German Chocolate cake mix,3/4 cup melted butter,15 ounce evaporated milk,114 ounce unwrapped vanilla caramels,1 cups chopped walnuts,1 cup semisweet chocolate pieces"

recipe.name: "Strawberry Cool Brûlée"
recipe.ingredients: "2 cups sliced strawberries,8 teaspoons raw sugar,1/2 cup whipping cream,1/3 cup low fat vanilla yogurt"

recipe.name: "Tortellini in Brodo"
recipe.ingredients: "300 g beef brisket,150 g beef shank bones,300 g free-range chicken thighs and drumsticks,1/2 an onion,1 stick of celery,1 carrot,200 g tipo 00 flour,2 large free-range eggs,olive oil,75 g higher-welfare prosciutto di Parma,50 g higher-welfare mortadella di Bologna,1 pinch of ground nutmeg,50 g Parmesan cheese"

recipe.name: "Pork Chops Pizzaiola"
recipe.ingredients: "2 tablespoons olive oil,2 bone-in pork loin center-cut chops,Salt and freshly ground black pepper,1 small onion, 15-ounce can diced tomatoes,1 teaspoon herbes de Provence,1/4 teaspoon dried red pepper flakes,1 tablespoon chopped fresh Italian parsley leaves"

recipe.name: "Bibimbap"
recipe.ingredients: "3 cups short grain rice,8 ounces beef rib eye,2 cups boiled gosari,16 ounces soybean sprouts,1 bunch spinach,2 kirby pickling cucumbers,2 small zucchinis,2 medium carrots,5 teaspoons minced garlic,2 or 3 scallions chopped,soy sauce,sesame oil,roasted sesame seeds,salt and pepper,vegetable or canola oil,4 eggs,4 tablespoons of Korean red chili pepper paste gochujang,1 tablespoon of sugar,1 tablespoon of sesame oil,3 tablespoons of water"

recipe.name: "Vietnamese noodle"
recipe.ingredients: "12 ounces thin Asian vermicelli noodles,2 carrots shredded,2 cucumbers seeded and shredded,4 green onion chopped,1/2 cups fresh bean sprouts,1/3 cup chopped cilantro,1/2 cup fish sauce,1/2 cup seasoned rice vinegar,3 tablespoons sugar,2 cloves garlic pressed or minced,1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper,Lime"

recipe.name: "Tex-Mex Quinoa Salad"
recipe.ingredients: "2 cups cooked quinoa,1 small bell pepper, diced,1/2 small red onion, diced,1 cup grape tomatoes, sliced or halved,1 cup black beans,1 cup loosely packed cilantro,1/2 cup corn,1 avocado,2 green onions,2 limes,1/2 cup avocado oil or olive oil,1/2 tsp. ground cumin,1/2 tsp. garlic powder,1/2 tsp. chili powder,1/2 tsp. sea salt"

recipe.name: "Chocolate Spoons"
recipe.ingredients: "60g bittersweet chocolate,6 spoons,toffee bits,sea salt,white chocolate,freeze-dried marshmallows"

recipe.name: "Best Brownies"
recipe.ingredients: "185g unsalted butter,185g best dark chocolate,85g plain flour,40g cocoa powder,50g white chocolate,50g milk chocolate,3 large eggs,275g golden caster sugar"
